Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: hugo

Arguments.Name: -b
Arguments.Description: Hostname (and path) to the root, e.g. http://spf13.com/

Arguments.Name: -D
Arguments.Description: Include content marked as draft (default false)

Arguments.Name: -F
Arguments.Description: Include content with publishdate in the future (default false)

Arguments.Name: --cacheDir
Arguments.Description: Filesystem path to cache directory. Defaults: $TMPDIR/hugo_cache/

Arguments.Name: --cleanDestinationDir
Arguments.Description: Remove files from destination not found in static directories (default false)

Arguments.Name: -d
Arguments.Description: Filesystem path to write files to

Arguments.Name: --disableKinds
Arguments.Description: Disable different kind of pages (home, RSS etc.)

Arguments.Name: --enableGitInfo
Arguments.Description: Add Git revision, date and author info to the pages (default false)

Arguments.Name: --forceSyncStatic
Arguments.Description: Copy all files when static is changed (default false)

Arguments.Name: --gc
Arguments.Description: Enable to run some cleanup tasks (remove unused cache files) after the build (default false)

Arguments.Name: --minify
Arguments.Description: Minify any supported output format (HTML, XML etc.) (default false)

Arguments.Name: --noChmod
Arguments.Description: Don't sync permission mode of files (default false)

Arguments.Name: --noTimes
Arguments.Description: Don't sync modification time of files (default false)

Arguments.Name: --path-warnings
Arguments.Description: Print warnings on duplicate target paths etc (default false)

Arguments.Name: --poll
Arguments.Description: Set this to a poll interval, e.g --poll 700ms, to use a poll based approach to watch for file system changes

Arguments.Name: --print-mem
Arguments.Description: Print memory usage to screen at intervals (default false)

Arguments.Name: --templateMetrics
Arguments.Description: Display metrics about template executions (default false)

Arguments.Name: --templateMetricsHints
Arguments.Description: Calculate some improvement hints when combined with --templateMetrics (default false)

Arguments.Name: --trace
Arguments.Description: Write trace to file (not useful in general)

Arguments.Name: --ignoreVendorPaths
Arguments.Description: Ignores any _vendor for module paths matching the given Glob pattern

Arguments.Name: --logFile
Arguments.Description: Log File path (if set, logging enabled automatically)

Arguments.Name: -s
Arguments.Description: Filesystem path to read files relative from

Arguments.Name: -w
Arguments.Description: Watch filesystem for changes and recreate as needed (default true)

Arguments.Name: --renderToMemory
Arguments.Description: Render to memory (only useful for benchmark testing)

Arguments.Description: Ignores any _vendor for module paths matching the given Glob pattern

Arguments.Name: autocomplete
Arguments.Description: Generate shell autocompletion script for Hugo (default outputs to stdout)

Arguments.Name: -t
Arguments.Description: Autocompletion type (bash, zsh, fish, or powershell) (default 'bash')

Arguments.Name: chromastyles
Arguments.Description: Generate CSS stylesheet for the Chroma code highlighter (default outputs to stdout)

Arguments.Name: --highlightStyle
Arguments.Description: Style used for highlighting lines (see https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma) (default 'bg:#ffffcc')

Arguments.Name: --linesStyle
Arguments.Description: Style used for line numbers (see https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma)

Arguments.Name: doc
Arguments.Description: Generate Markdown documentation for the Hugo CLI (default '/tmp/hugodoc/')

Arguments.Name: --dir
Arguments.Description: The directory to write the doc. (default '/tmp/hugodoc/')

Arguments.Name: man
Arguments.Description: Generate man pages for the Hugo CLI (default 'man/')

Arguments.Name: --dir
Arguments.Description: The directory to write the man pages. (default 'man/')

Arguments.Name: clean
Arguments.Description: Delete the Hugo Module cache for the current project

Arguments.Name: --pattern
Arguments.Description: Pattern matching module paths to clean (all if not set)", "e.g. "**hugo*"

Arguments.Name: get
Arguments.Description: Resolves dependencies in your current Hugo Project

Arguments.Name: d
Arguments.Description: Download packages only and do not install

Arguments.Name: f
Arguments.Description: Valid only when -u is set, forces get -u not to verify that each package has been checked out from the source control repository implied by its import path. This can be useful if the source is a local fork of the original

Arguments.Name: -fix
Arguments.Description: Run the fix tool on downloaded packages before resolving dependencies or building the code

Arguments.Name: -insecure
Arguments.Description: Permits fetching from repositories and resolving custom domains using insecure schemes such as HTTP. Use with caution

Arguments.Name: t
Arguments.Description: Also download the packages required to build the tests for the specified packages

Arguments.Name: u
Arguments.Description: Recursively update modules. Use network to update the named packages and their dependencies. By default, get uses the network to check out missing packages but does not use it to look for updates to existing packages

Arguments.Name: v
Arguments.Description: Enables verbose progress and debug output

Arguments.Name: graph
Arguments.Description: Use `hugo mod graph` from the relevant module directory and it will print the dependency graph, including vendoring, module replacement or disabled status

Arguments.Name: init
Arguments.Description: Initialize this project as a Hugo Module

Arguments.Name: pack
Arguments.Description: Experimental: Prepares and writes a composite package.json file for your project

Arguments.Name: tidy
Arguments.Description: Remove unused entries in go.mod and go.sum

Arguments.Name: vendor
Arguments.Description: Vendor all module dependencies into the _vendor directory

Arguments.Name: --clean
Arguments.Description: Delete module cache for dependencies that fail verification

Arguments.Name: new
Arguments.Description: Create new content for your site

Arguments.Name: --bind
Arguments.Description: Interface to which the server will bind (default '127.0.0.1')

Arguments.Name: --disableBrowserError
Arguments.Description: Do not show build errors in the browser (default false)

Arguments.Name: --disableFastRender
Arguments.Description: Enables full re-renders on changes (default false)

Arguments.Name: --disableLiveReload
Arguments.Description: Watch without enabling live browser reload on rebuild (default false)

Arguments.Name: --liveReloadPort
Arguments.Description: Port for live reloading (i.e. 443 in HTTPS proxy situations) (default -1)

Arguments.Name: --meminterval
Arguments.Description: Interval to poll memory usage (requires --memstats), valid time units are 'ns', 'us' (or 'µs'), 'ms', 's', 'm', 'h'. (default '100ms')

Arguments.Name: --memstats
Arguments.Description: Log memory usage to this file

Arguments.Name: --navigateToChanged
Arguments.Description: Navigate to changed content file on live browser reload (default false)

Arguments.Name: -p
Arguments.Description: Port on which the server will listen (default 1313)

Arguments.Name: --renderToDisk
Arguments.Description: Render to Destination path (default is false: render to memory & serve from there)

Arguments.Description: Print the version number of Hugo
